column4: Is there a lightweight powerpoint viewer for Gnome?  My laptop makes using OOo for just looking at ppts a pain in the ass
Try the standalone viewer from micro$haft in WINE
I saw that on my google search but I'd rather not pull out wine just yet
There are a few lightweight presentation apps for X and GNOME and KDE (but forget their names) and they MAY have support for powerpoint files
